page.title: 08INGOLDSBY SOCIAL CLUB
page.content:
We have a social club in Ingoldsby where you can buy drinks and it is also used for parties meetings etc. When it is bonfire night we all go to the club and there is a big bonfire and fireworks behind the club building on the playing field.
There are some swings, a slide and a playrocking horse, so if you have a little child you can have a drink and your child can have a play. There is a snooker table, a darts board and other games to play in the club. They also hold Bingo there to raise funds for the cricket and football clubs. There are also some benches so you can sit down. If you have a dog there is plenty of room for it to run about. There are also some tennis courts, a football pitch and a cricker pitch.
